channel.title: CVE Feed for Yet Another bol.com Plugin -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-38330|2024-09-17T04:23:48.920Z -- yet%20another%20bol.com%20plugin -- yet%20another%20bol.com%20plugin
item.description: The Yet Another bol.com Plugin WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/yabp.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.4.
